ing: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle good-quality crisp white wine
des: "This is a deliciously cool French traditional summer cocktail that always wows my guests. But be warned, it goes down a little too easily! Make a large punch-bowlful for a large gathering, or a jugful for your family barbecue. It suits every occasion! Here in Mediterranean France, it's often served at summer garden parties."
ins: Stir wine, lemonade, lemon juice, syrup, and cognac together in a pitcher; refrigerate 8 hours to overnight. Garnish with lemon, lime, and orange slices to serve.
